description: 1 x Mature Conifer (applicants ref T1) - Approximately 13.00m (Dead Tree): Section Fell to ground level. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.   (Exempt works) 1 x Mature Oak (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 22.00m: Remove major dead wood throughout crown. Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches overhanging and growing towards the house to the west of the crown by approximately 1.50m-2.00m. General maintenance / Control encroachment. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Laurel (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 6.00m: Fell to ground level. To re0establish new fence line/re-landscaping. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Mature Pine (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 13.00m: Remove dead limbs throughout. General maintenance. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. (Exempt works)1 x Laurel (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 5.00m: Reduce back from drive, approximately 1.20m. General maintenance. Control encroachment. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Twin stemmed Yew (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately9.00m-10.00m: Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches over drive by approximately 2.00m. To control encroachment. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Box Elder (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately10.00m: Reduce the over extended limb back from drive to a strong viable upright branch, approximately 3.00m. To control encroachment over driveway. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.Group of Thuja (applicants ref. G1) - Approximately 9.00m: Remove dead tops and major dead wood throughout. General maintenance. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. (Exempt works)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
